price: Dhugumatti, isheen isatti yaadde, innis isheetti yaade, Odoo ragaa Gooftaa isaa arguu baatee. Akka kanatti hamtuufi hojii fokkataa isa irraa deebisuuf (ragaa keenya isa agarsiifne). Dhugumatti, inni gabroota keenya qulqulleeffamoo irraayyi.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ هَمَّتۡ بِهِۦۖ وَهَمَّ بِهَا لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّءَا بُرۡهَٰنَ رَبِّهِۦۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنَصۡرِفَ عَنۡهُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءَۚ إِنَّهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad hammat bihi wahamma bihā lawlā an raā bur'hāna rabbihi kadhālika linaṣrifa ʿanhu al-sūa wal-faḥshāa innahu min ʿibādinā al-mukh'laṣīna
